title: cassiopeia w bug
body: There is a bug where when cassiopeia uses her w there are no visual effects making it seem invisible.Riot please fix this soon because it can be quite annoying to some players laneing against casiopeia.{{champion:69}}

replies.body:
i have made a support ticket with the same bug and still awaiting an answer 
dunno why you got voted down but had this happen twice on separate games
